recipesJson.name: Jazzy's Gummy Bears
recipesJson.author: Jazzy_girl
recipesJson.description: Spot on gummy bears.  Shake n vape or steep for a week or two.  The flavors marry really well into a realistic gummy flavor.

reviews.text: Tastes just like a gummy bear, very accurate, I've made this for 3 other people as well who cannot get enough of it.
